x_align.name: X Alignment
x_align.tooltip:
Horizontal alignment:
- from_left: Calculate offset from left
- from_right: Calculate offset from right (enables tight right alignment)

y_align.name: Y Alignment
y_align.tooltip:
Vertical alignment:
- from_top: Calculate offset from top
- from_bottom: Calculate offset from bottom (enables tight bottom alignment)

x_offset.name: X Offset
x_offset.tooltip: Horizontal offset pixels, can be negative (use with alignment)

y_offset.name: Y Offset
y_offset.tooltip: Vertical offset pixels, can be negative (use with alignment)

scale_mode.name: Scale Mode
scale_mode.tooltip:
Scaling mode:
- relative_to_overlay: scale by overlay's size
- relative_to_background_width: width = scale × bg width
- relative_to_background_height: height = scale × bg height

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Complete Photoshop Blend Modes:
normal: Normal - Direct overlay
darken: Darken - Select darker pixels
multiply: Multiply - Colors multiply to darken
color_burn: Color Burn - Darken with increased contrast
linear_burn: Linear Burn - Linear darkening
lighten: Lighten - Select brighter pixels
screen: Screen - Inverse multiply to lighten
color_dodge: Color Dodge - Lighten with reduced contrast
linear_dodge: Linear Dodge - Direct addition to lighten
overlay: Overlay - Combines multiply and screen
soft_light: Soft Light - Gentle contrast enhancement
hard_light: Hard Light - Strong contrast enhancement
vivid_light: Vivid Light - Extreme contrast effect
linear_light: Linear Light - Linear contrast adjustment
pin_light: Pin Light - Replace colors based on brightness
hard_mix: Hard Mix - Creates solid color results
difference: Difference - Absolute difference of colors
exclusion: Exclusion - Softer difference effect
subtract: Subtract - Direct color subtraction
divide: Divide - Color division operation
hue: Hue - Change only hue, keep saturation & lightness
saturation: Saturation - Change only saturation
color: Color - Change hue & saturation, keep lightness
luminosity: Luminosity - Change only lightness

RGBA_mode.name: RGBA Mode
RGBA_mode.tooltip: Force RGBA output. If no alpha, add opaque channel.

fill_opacity.name: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.tooltip:
Original image fill opacity:
- 1.0: Normal image display
- 0.0: Hollow effect, shadow only
- 0.5: Semi-transparent image + shadow

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Drop shadow blend mode:
- normal: Normal blending
- multiply: Multiply, classic shadow
- color_burn: Color burn, deep shadow
- linear_burn: Linear burn, soft shadow
- darken: Darken, gentle shadow

auto_expand_canvas.name: Auto Expand Canvas
auto_expand_canvas.tooltip:
Auto expand canvas:
- True: Auto expand canvas when shadow exceeds bounds
- False: Shadow is clipped to original canvas size

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Stroke blend mode:
- normal: Normal blending, direct overlay
- multiply: Multiply, darkens colors
- screen: Screen, lightens colors
- overlay: Overlay, enhances contrast
- color_burn: Color burn, deeper shadows

fill_opacity.name: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.tooltip:
Original image fill opacity:
- 1.0: Normal image display
- 0.0: Hollow effect, stroke only
- 0.5: Semi-transparent image + stroke

auto_expand_canvas.name: Auto Expand Canvas
auto_expand_canvas.tooltip:
Auto expand canvas:
- True: Auto expand canvas when stroke exceeds bounds
- False: Stroke is clipped to original canvas size

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip:
Outer glow blend mode:
- normal: Normal blending
- screen: Screen, classic glow effect
- color_dodge: Color dodge, intense glow
- linear_dodge: Linear dodge, soft glow
- lighten: Lighten, gentle glow

fill_opacity.name: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.tooltip:
Original image fill opacity:
- 1.0: Normal image display
- 0.0: Hollow effect, glow only
- 0.5: Semi-transparent image + glow

auto_expand_canvas.name: Auto Expand Canvas
auto_expand_canvas.tooltip:
Auto expand canvas:
- True: Auto expand canvas when glow exceeds bounds
- False: Glow is clipped to original canvas size

channel.name: Channel
channel.tooltip:
Channel to extract:
- red: Red channel
- green: Green channel (often best for green screen)
- blue: Blue channel
- alpha: Alpha channel (if available)
- luminance: Luminance (0.299*R + 0.587*G + 0.114*B)

mask_mode.name: Mask Mode
mask_mode.tooltip:
Mask application mode:
- alpha: Use mask as alpha channel
- multiply: Multiply image by mask (darken)

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.tooltip: Threshold for mask (values below this become transparent)

gradient_type.name: Gradient Type
gradient_type.tooltip:
Gradient type:
- linear: Linear gradient
- radial: Radial gradient from center
- angular: Angular/conical gradient
- reflected: Reflected linear gradient

angle.name: Angle
angle.tooltip: Gradient angle in degrees (for linear and reflected types)

size_mode.name: Size Mode
size_mode.tooltip:
Size mode:
- from_image: Use reference image size
- custom: Specify custom width and height

width.name: Width
width.tooltip: Width in pixels (used in custom mode)

height.name: Height
height.tooltip: Height in pixels (used in custom mode)

center_x.name: Center X
center_x.tooltip: Horizontal center position (0-1, for radial and angular)

center_y.name: Center Y
center_y.tooltip: Vertical center position (0-1, for radial and angular)

reference_image.name: Reference Image
reference_image.tooltip: Reference image for size (used when size_mode is from_image)

method.name: Method
method.tooltip: Blur algorithm:\n- PIL: Fast, general purpose\n- OpenCV: Precise, professional grade

method.name: Method
method.tooltip:
Sharpening method:
- unsharp_mask: Classic unsharp masking
- high_pass: High-pass filter sharpening
- edge_enhance: Edge enhancement sharpening

target_color.name: Target Color
target_color.tooltip:
Target color range:
- master: All colors
- reds: Red range
- yellows: Yellow range
- greens: Green range
- cyans: Cyan range
- blues: Blue range
- magentas: Magenta range

fill_mode.name: Fill Mode
fill_mode.tooltip:
Fill mode:
- color: Fill with solid color
- edge: Extend edge pixels
- mirror: Mirror edge content
- transparent: Transparent fill (RGBA only)

scale_method.name: Scale Method
scale_method.tooltip:
Scale method:
- percentage: Scale by percentage
- dimensions: Exact dimensions
- fit_width: Fit to width (keep ratio)
- fit_height: Fit to height (keep ratio)
- fit_longest: Fit to longest side (keep ratio)
- fit_shortest: Fit to shortest side (keep ratio)

resampling.name: Resampling
resampling.tooltip:
Resampling algorithm:
- LANCZOS: Highest quality (slow)
- BICUBIC: High quality
- BILINEAR: Medium quality
- NEAREST: Fastest (low quality)

crop_method.name: Crop Method
crop_method.tooltip:
Crop method:
- manual: Manual coordinates
- center: Center crop to size
- aspect_ratio: Crop by ratio (centered)

aspect_width.name: Aspect Width
aspect_width.tooltip: Width part of aspect ratio (ratio mode)

aspect_height.name: Aspect Height
aspect_height.tooltip: Height part of aspect ratio (ratio mode)

anchor.name: Anchor
anchor.tooltip:
Image anchor position in new canvas:
- center: Center
- top_left: Top-left corner
- top_center: Top center
- top_right: Top-right corner
- middle_left: Middle left
- middle_right: Middle right
- bottom_left: Bottom-left corner
- bottom_center: Bottom center
- bottom_right: Bottom-right corner

ensure_alpha.name: Ensure Alpha
ensure_alpha.tooltip: Ensure alpha channel in output:\n- True: Force RGBA output format\n- False: Keep original format (RGB stays RGB)

input_black.name: Input Black
input_black.tooltip: Input black point (0.0-0.9, raising darkens shadows)

input_white.name: Input White
input_white.tooltip: Input white point (0.1-1.0, lowering brightens highlights)

gamma.name: Gamma
gamma.tooltip: Gamma value (<1.0 brightens midtones, >1.0 darkens midtones)

channel.name: Channel
channel.tooltip: Adjustment channel:\n- RGB: Adjust all channels together\n- Red/Green/Blue: Adjust individual color channels

contrast.name: Contrast
contrast.tooltip: Contrast adjustment (-100 to 100, negative=less contrast, positive=more contrast)

method.name: Method
method.tooltip: Adjustment algorithm:\n- PIL: Use PIL library algorithm\n- OpenCV: Use OpenCV algorithm, more precise

tone_range.name: Tone Range
tone_range.tooltip:
Tone range:
- midtones: Midtones (main adjustment area)
- shadows: Shadows (dark areas)
- highlights: Highlights (bright areas)

preserve_luminosity.name: Preserve Luminosity
preserve_luminosity.tooltip: Preserve luminosity:\n- True: Keep image brightness unchanged\n- False: Allow brightness changes

red_from_red.name: Red from Red
red_from_red.tooltip: Red channel contribution to red output (%)

red_from_green.name: Red from Green
red_from_green.tooltip: Green channel contribution to red output (%)

red_from_blue.name: Red from Blue
red_from_blue.tooltip: Blue channel contribution to red output (%)

green_from_red.name: Green from Red
green_from_red.tooltip: Red channel contribution to green output (%)

green_from_green.name: Green from Green
green_from_green.tooltip: Green channel contribution to green output (%)

green_from_blue.name: Green from Blue
green_from_blue.tooltip: Blue channel contribution to green output (%)

blue_from_red.name: Blue from Red
blue_from_red.tooltip: Red channel contribution to blue output (%)

blue_from_green.name: Blue from Green
blue_from_green.tooltip: Green channel contribution to blue output (%)

blue_from_blue.name: Blue from Blue
blue_from_blue.tooltip: Blue channel contribution to blue output (%)

monochrome.name: Monochrome
monochrome.tooltip: Monochrome mode:\n- True: Output grayscale image (uses only red channel settings)\n- False: Output color image
